Class TileCalculator

java.lang.Object
  org.openstreetmap.osmosis.core.util.TileCalculator
      org.openstreetmap.osm.data.TileCalculator

public class TileCalculator
extends org.openstreetmap.osmosis.core.util.TileCalculator

Improved Osmosis-Tile-Calculator that can also do the inverse calculation.
